Fault.name: BPELs/bpelUpdateUuid.bpel

Fault.name: BPELs/bpelValidateInvoicesAP.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::cmn:Error" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.

Fault.name: BPELs/sbpelLogPaymentComplement.sbpel
